name: Jailbreak Russia
description: You have to play the character Stickman. Your task is to find two successful ways to escape from a Russian prison.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 25 MB available space
